body.p:
Bedford Trmible Co Kentucky
Feby 20th 1865
To his Excellency Thomas E. Bramlette governor of the Commonwealth of Kentucky,

Your Petitioner Robert O. Whitaker a citizen of Trimble County Kentucky, would respectfully represent that at the October term of the Trimble circuit court 1863 he was fined the Sum of Twenty Dollars for pitching Dollars. for which he was not aware that it was a fineable offence

He with other boys were only amusing themselves and Sometimes the one who got beat would have to treat. He therefour prays your honor to remit Said fine as he is a poor man and unable to do more these war times than support his family.
We the undersigned citizens and neighbors of Mr Whitaker respectfully request the Governor to grant the prayer of the above petitioner

Silas Gatewood
